name: Taking my daughter to some illegal gambling
name_original: Taking my daughter to some illegal gambling
description:
For the GMTK game Jam 2022 I made a lovely story of a father who wants to have some quality time with his daughter... by taking her to some illegal gambling...

Throw the dice to reach the target number, but you can change the outcome by hitting the wall, glasses or mugs.

Throwing is done by moving around first with the arrow keys. Then you lock your position with SPACE. Press or hold space to start charging! This determines the speed at which you throw the dice ^^

If you want to cancel the movement lock, press shift. Oh and use control to switch the side you start throwing with!

(By clicking the title on the title screen you can start the first cutscene)
